instructions: Download Node.js
cd eng/common/tsp-client
npm ci
npm install -g @typespec/compiler@latest
Download and install PowerShell
Download and install GitHub CLI

core.requirement: longpaths in git config should be enabled for Windows
instructions: Check the Registry Editor to ensure that LongPathsEnabled exists and is set to 1 in `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\FileSystem`.
git config --global core.longpaths true
Install Python from https://www.python.org/downloads/ if using Windows or MacOS
If using Ubuntu, run `sudo apt install python-is-python3`, `sudo apt install python3-pip`, `sudo apt install python3-venv`.
core.reason: Python is required for all repos because it's used in a common Verify-Readme Powershell script.

instructions: python -m ensurepip
If using Ubuntu, run `sudo apt install python3-pip`
core.reason: Pip is required for all repos because it's used in a common Verify-Readme Powershell script.

instructions: Download JDK
Set JAVA_HOME environment variable to the JDK installation path
Add JAVA_HOME/bin to your PATH environment variable
Restart your IDE.
Download the latest version of Maven.
Set MAVEN_HOME environment variable to the Maven installation path
Add MAVEN_HOME/bin to your PATH environment variable
Restart your IDE.
npm install -g pnpm
Run pnpm install in the repo root.
Install .NET SDK with version at least higher than defined in global.json file in the repo root.
Download and install the latest Go version of the compiler on https://go.dev/dl/
If using Ubuntu, run `sudo snap install go`
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports@latest
https://golangci-lint.run/docs/welcome/install/
go install github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/eng/tools/generator@latest
Install Python from https://www.python.org/downloads/
Navigate to the Python SDK repository root directory
Ensure your virtual environment is activated
python -m pip install eng/tools/azure-sdk-tools[build]
Check that it was installed with azpysdk --help
python.reason: `azpysdk` is used for validating Python SDKs.
